Title: Autotrader.com's Mars Rover
Plot: When Clark Wood of Autotrader.com walks into the first client meeting, Marc and Shanon are psyched. Mix speed, futuristic design, and high-horsepower electric engines? You have their attention. Clark gives the guys a bit to come up with their best, and then comes back to go over the designs. They need something that, while futuristic and badass, will still stop jaded auto show-goers in their tracks.  Time for Shanon to bring his "A" game. The Turbo-Teen-meets-moon-buggy concept is a go.
